Class EnvironmentDetector.EnvironmentDetectorAsyncTask

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    EnvironmentDetector

    private class EnvironmentDetector.EnvironmentDetectorAsyncTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<android.content.Context,java.lang.Void,java.util.List<Environment>>
    This class runs the actual environment detection task in a separate thread. Used internally by EnvironmentDetector class

        protected java.util.List<Environment> doInBackground(android.content.Context... params)
        The function which is run in background. Checks for the stored environments which matches the current variable values

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(java.util.List<Environment> environments)
        This function is executed in the UI thread when doInBackground is finished. It calls the call back function passed, and passes the detected environment to it
        Overrides:
        onPostExecute in class android.os.AsyncTask<android.content.Context,java.lang.Void,java.util.List<Environment>>

        Checks whether the passed environments match the current bluetooth and wifi variables
        Parameters:
